attributes.action: Lower the ban on social media for under 16s to be under 13 years old
attributes.additional_details: People between 13 and 16 should not be banned from using social media
attributes.background: Lower the ban age from 16 years old to 13 years old

rejection.details:
We already have a petition on this which is open and which you can sign:

Government ban on social media to be for under 13s only
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/757849
